siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Chums is a community to recommend products to friends. 1. Make a profile with your favorite products 2. Ask your friends and interest groups for help 3. Make group chats just for shopping
blogPost.body: Chums is a community to recommend products to friends. 1. Make a profile with your favorite products 2. Ask your friends and interest groups for help 3. Make group chats just for shopping
blogPost.title: Chums - Help friends buy stuff online
blogPost.author: Noah Elion

localize.description: Chums是一个向朋友推荐产品的社区。1. 用你喜欢的产品建立一个档案 2. 向你的朋友和兴趣小组寻求帮助 3. 建立群聊，只为购物
localize.tagline: 帮助朋友在网上买东西

localize.description: Chums是一個向朋友推薦產品的社區。1. 用你喜歡的產品建立一個檔案 2. 向你的朋友和興趣小組尋求幫助 3. 建立羣聊，只爲購物
localize.tagline: 幫助朋友在網上買東西

previous.excerpt: FlashDrive NoOps app platform handles everything for you while you focus on your product. Made by developers for developers, FlashDrive is compatible with Git deployment (Github, Gitlabs etc...), DockerHub etc... Free backups, SSL certs. and load balancers.
previous.title: FlashDrive.io - noOps app platform for your apps

localize.description: FlashDrive NoOps应用平台为你处理一切，而你则专注于你的产品。FlashDrive由开发者为开发者而生，兼容Git部署（Github、Gitlabs等...）、DockerHub等。免费备份，SSL证书.和负载平衡器。
localize.tagline: 为您的应用提供noOps应用平台

localize.description: FlashDrive NoOps應用平臺爲你處理一切，而你則專注於你的產品。FlashDrive由開發者爲開發者而生，兼容Git部署（Github、Gitlabs等...）、DockerHub等。免費備份，SSL證書.和負載平衡器。
localize.tagline: 爲您的應用提供noOps應用平臺

next.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
next.title: Jooseph - Content curation tool for paid learning paths

localize.description: Jooseph是一个内容策划工具，供课程创建者与受众分享学习路径。- 从网络上的任何链接创建交互式学习路径--接受付费订阅，并赚钱--发布公告，让你的受众得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付费学习路径的内容策划工具

localize.description: Jooseph是一個內容策劃工具，供課程創建者與受衆分享學習路徑。- 從網絡上的任何鏈接創建交互式學習路徑--接受付費訂閱，並賺錢--發佈公告，讓你的受衆得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付費學習路徑的內容策劃工具
